message.content: {"id": "3970", "title": "Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)", "description": "Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).", "OB": "When new files are created on Windows, they currently have Windows line delimiters.", "EB": "Even if the new file is created on Windows, it should have Unix line delimiters, as the end product is a Unix product.", "SR": "Consider the following scenario: Unix and Windows workstations are used to develop a Unix product/program. There should be a UI (Preference) in the Workbench to define the line delimiter for new files. Possible values should include Dos/Windows, Mac, Unix, and the default platform line delimiter. The UI should be provided by the Workbench to ensure all plugins use the same line delimiter for new files."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'even if the new file is created on Windows it should have Unix line delimiters since the end product is a Unix product.There should be a UI (Preference) to define the line delimiter for new files. Possible values are: Dos / Windows Mac Unix default platform line delimiter.The UI should be provided by the Workbench since all plugins should use the same line delimiter for new files.NOTES: ', 'SR': 'Consider the following sceanrio: Unix and Windows work station used to develop a Unix product / program. '}
